snippet.title: Monkey Doo - Official Launch Trailer | Meta Quest, Steam VR
snippet.description:
🔥 Monkey Doo - Official Trailer | Available 3/14 on Quest & Steam VR 🔥

Available 3/14 on Meta Quest & Steam: https://www.monkeydoovr.com/

🔥 Climb, explore, and navigate through floating forests, crocodile infested swamps, lava chasms, and more using your hands to swing on vines, bounce on clouds, slide on ziplines, and of course, climb on trees! "Monkey Doo” is a physically engaging experience with unique ‘doo-throwing’ mechanics that's both fun and challenging.

With the game's launch on the Meta store, "Monkey Doo" is introducing a host of player-driven updates and enhancements that are set to elevate the experience to new heights.

🎥 Official Trailer Features:
- Enhanced Graphics and Performance
- New Maps and Modes
- Improved Customization
- Optimized Multiplayer Experience
- Continuous Updates and Lore Expansion

------------------------------------------------------

About Monkey Doo:
Live in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle with all your Monkey friends! Swing on vines, throw doo at your enemies, and climb everything! 

- Huge Maps: Explore the Bermuda Jungle, Floating Forests, Ancient Ruins, Lava Chasm, and more

- Unique Gamemodes: Be the first to collect 10 bananas or work together to fend off hordes of crocs -- new modes are coming all the time

- Monkey Apparel: Customize your body color, equip face & head cosmetics, and stylize your doo 

------------------------------------------------------

🌐 Connect with Us:
- Join the fight on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/mG5yrZCShz
- Follow for updates on Twitter: @MonkeyDooVR
- Visit the Meta Quest Store: https://www.meta.com/experiences/5635852399856124/
- Visit the Steam VR Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2233580/Monkey_See_Monkey_Doo_Doo/
- Discover more at: www.monkeydoovr.com

📅 Available March 14th!
"Monkey Doo" is out 3/14! Grab your VR headset and start slinging doo!
